name: Ray S. jone
comment: The best graphics cards are the lifeblood of any gaming PC — they're the beating heart pumping out stunningly-rendered pixels to your screen.

name: Ray S. Hopper
comment: Nvidia's GeForce RTX 3080 sports the new and improved Ampere architecture. It's over 30% faster than the previous gen 2080 Ti, and supposedly costs $500 less...

name: Anthony C. Jacobs
comment: For some, the best card is the fastest card — pricing be damned! Nvidia's GeForce RTX 3090 caters to this category of user....
